text: Gary Kersey Hart (August 13, 1943 â€“ January 27, 2022) was an American Democratic politician, educator, and pro-charter school activist. Hart was born in San Diego, California. He was a member of the California State Assembly between 1974 until 1982. He was also a member of the California Senate from 1982 until 1994. Hart died on January 27, 2022 at his home in Sacramento, California from pancreatic cancer at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American political activists Category:Educators from San Diego Category:Politicians from San Diego Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Gary K. Hart
